name: Path of the Berserker
description: Barbarians who walk the Path of the Berserker direct their Rage primarily toward violence. They thrill in the chaos of battle, allowing their Rage to seize and empower them.

features.level3: Frenzy: Extra damage to first target on your turn when using Reckless Attack while raging.
features.level6: Mindless Rage: Immunity to Charmed and Frightened while raging.
features.level10: Retaliation: Reaction melee attack against a creature that damages you within 5 feet.
features.level14: Intimidating Presence: Frighten enemies in a 30-foot radius as a Bonus Action (once per Long Rest, or spend a Rage to refresh).

name: Path of the Wild Heart
description: Barbarians who embrace the Path of the Wild Heart channel the primal power of animals, drawing on different totems for their Rage.

features.level3: Rage of the Wilds: Choose Bear (resistance to many damage types), Eagle (Disengage and Dash as Bonus Action), or Wolf (ally advantage on attacks).
features.level6: Aspect of the Wilds: Choose Owl (Darkvision), Panther (Climb Speed), or Salmon (Swim Speed) at each Long Rest.
features.level10: Nature Speaker: Cast Commune with Nature as a Ritual.
features.level14: Power of the Wilds: Choose Falcon (Fly Speed), Lion (enemy disadvantage), or Ram (prone on hit) each time you Rage.

name: Path of the World Tree
description: Barbarians who follow the Path of the World Tree draw on the cosmic Yggdrasil for vitality and dimensional travel.

features.level3: Vitality Surge and Life-Giving Force: Gain Temporary Hit Points when you Rage, and grant them to others within 10 feet each turn.
features.level6: Branches of the Tree: Use Reaction to teleport an enemy within 30 feet and reduce its Speed to 0.
features.level10: Battering Roots: +10 ft reach for Heavy/Versatile weapons and extra mastery property use.
features.level14: Travel along the Tree: Teleport up to 60 ft as a Bonus Action, or 150 ft with up to 6 allies once per Rage.

name: Path of the Zealot
description: Barbarians who walk the Path of the Zealot channel divine fury, becoming champions of their gods.

features.level3: Divine Fury: Deal extra radiant or necrotic damage on your first hit each turn while raging.
features.level6: Warrior of the Gods: Resurrection magic doesn’t require material components for you.
features.level10: Zealous Presence: Bonus Action to grant advantage on attack rolls and saving throws to allies within 60 feet for 1 round.
features.level14: Rage Beyond Death: While raging, you can continue fighting at 0 HP and won’t die until your Rage ends.

name: College of Dance
description: Bards of the College of Dance understand that the Words of Creation are expressed through motion. They channel this power through dancing to inspire allies and distract foes.

features.level3: Dazzling Footwork: Advantage on Performance (dance), Unarmored Defense, Agile Strikes with Bardic Inspiration.
features.level6: Inspiring Movement: Move and grant an ally movement when an enemy ends their turn near you.
features.level6_2: Tandem Footwork: Bonus to Initiative for you and allies by expending Bardic Inspiration.
features.level14: Leading Evasion: Share Evasion benefit with allies within 5 feet.

name: College of Glamour
description: The College of Glamour draws on the fey's beguiling magic. Bards of this college evoke ancient longings and instill fear and wonder through their performances.

features.level3: Mantle of Inspiration: Grant Temporary HP and movement without Opportunity Attacks.
features.level3_2: Enthralling Performance: Charm and captivate up to 5 creatures.
features.level6: Mantle of Majesty: Cast Command as a Bonus Action while Charmed creatures fail the save automatically.
features.level14: Unbreakable Majesty: Become harder to hit as attackers recoil from your presence.

name: College of Lore
description: The College of Lore values knowledge above all. Its bards seek out hidden truths and use their knowledge to outwit foes.

features.level3: Bonus Proficiencies: Gain proficiency in three skills of your choice.
features.level3_2: Cutting Words: Use Bardic Inspiration to subtract from an enemy's roll.
features.level6: Magical Discoveries: Learn two additional spells from Cleric, Druid, or Wizard lists.
features.level14: Peerless Skill: Use Bardic Inspiration to potentially turn a failed roll into a success.

name: College of Valor
description: Bards of the College of Valor sing the deeds of legendary heroes, inspiring others to brave acts of courage.

features.level3: Combat Inspiration: Use Bardic Inspiration for AC or damage bonuses.
features.level3_2: Martial Training: Proficiency with Martial weapons, Medium armor, and Shields.
features.level6: Extra Attack: Attack twice when you take the Attack action.
features.level14: Battle Magic: Cast a spell as an Action, then make a weapon attack as a Bonus Action.

name: Life Domain
description: Focuses on the positive energy that sustains life, healing allies and supporting communities.

level3: Disciple of Life: Additional healing when using spell slots.
Life Domain Spells: Always prepared spells (Aid, Bless, Cure Wounds, Lesser Restoration).
Preserve Life: Channel Divinity to distribute healing.
features.level6: Blessed Healer: You regain Hit Points when you cast healing spells on others.
features.level17: Supreme Healing: Always use max value for healing dice.

name: Light Domain
description: Harness the power of light to banish darkness and reveal hidden truths.

level3: Light Domain Spells: Always prepared spells (Faerie Fire, Burning Hands, etc.).
Warding Flare: Use your reaction to impose disadvantage on an attack against you.
features.level6: Improved Flare: Use Warding Flare for allies within 30 feet.
features.level17: Corona of Light: Bright light aura with radiant power.

name: Trickery Domain
description: Embrace illusions and trickery to undermine oppressors and challenge the status quo.

level3: Blessing of the Trickster: Advantage on Stealth for yourself or an ally.
Invoke Duplicity: Create an illusion of yourself for tactical advantages.
Trickery Domain Spells: Always prepared spells (Charm Person, Disguise Self, Invisibility, Pass without Trace).
features.level6: Improved Duplicity: Use your illusion to heal or distract enemies.
features.level17: Improved Distraction: Attack rolls have Advantage when enemies are within 5 feet of the illusion.

name: War Domain
description: Lead allies into battle and channel divine might to bolster combat.

level3: Guided Strike: +10 bonus to an attack roll as a reaction.
War Domain Spells: Always prepared spells (Guiding Bolt, Magic Weapon, Shield of Faith, Spiritual Weapon).
War Priest: Bonus Action attacks a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier.
features.level6: War God's Blessing: Use Channel Divinity to cast Shield of Faith or Spiritual Weapon without using spell slots.
features.level17: Avatar of Battle: Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.

name: Circle of the Land
description: Mystics and sages who safeguard ancient knowledge and rites, attuning to the land's spirits and drawing on the power of natural realms.

level3: Circle Spells: Choose a land type and gain associated spells that are always prepared.
Land's Aid: Use Wild Shape to heal allies and damage foes in a 10-foot radius.
features.level6: Natural Recovery: Regain expended spell slots after a Short Rest.
features.level10: Nature’s Ward: Gain immunity to Poisoned condition and resistance to a damage type based on your land choice.
features.level14: Nature’s Sanctuary: Summon spectral trees and vines to shield allies and move them across the battlefield.

name: Circle of the Moon
description: Druids of this circle draw on lunar magic to transform themselves, changing forms as swiftly as the moon's phases.

level3: Circle Forms: Wild Shape into beasts of higher Challenge Ratings and gain enhanced AC and temporary HP.
Circle of the Moon Spells: Always have certain spells prepared that can be cast even while in Wild Shape.
features.level6: Improved Circle Forms: Attacks can deal Radiant damage, and you gain a bonus to Constitution saves while in Wild Shape.

name: Circle of the Sea
description: Embody the power of oceans and tides, channeling elemental magic and moving with the flow of water.

features.level3: Gain water-themed Circle Spells and the ability to breathe underwater and swim at speed.
features.level6: Sea’s Protection: Gain resistance to cold damage and improved mobility underwater.
features.level10: Tidal Surge: Use your Wild Shape to create waves that knock enemies prone and move allies.
features.level14: Avatar of the Sea: Summon watery forms to protect allies and strike foes.

name: Circle of the Stars
description: Seek to chart the constellations and draw upon their power to heal, protect, and transform.

features.level3: Star Map: Create a magical map to track constellations and gain cosmic insights.
features.level6: Cosmic Form: Use your Wild Shape to take on a constellation’s aspect, bolstering your magic and combat abilities.
features.level10: Celestial Resilience: Gain temporary HP and protect allies when casting certain spells.
features.level14: Galactic Convergence: Unleash radiant energy in an aura that heals allies and damages foes.

name: Battle Master
description: Battle Masters are students of the art of battle, mastering combat maneuvers passed down through generations.

level3: Combat Superiority: Learn maneuvers and gain Superiority Dice to fuel them.
Student of War: Gain proficiency with one Artisan's Tool and one skill of your choice.
features.level7: Know Your Enemy: Discern a creature's resistances, immunities, and vulnerabilities.
features.level10: Improved Combat Superiority: Superiority Dice become d10s.
features.level15: Relentless: Once per turn, you can roll 1d8 and use the number without expending a Superiority Die.
features.level18: Ultimate Combat Superiority: Superiority Dice become d12s.

name: Champion
description: Champions focus on physical perfection and excel in combat with greater resilience and precision.

features.level3: Improved Critical: Score critical hits on rolls of 19 or 20.
features.level7: Remarkable Athlete: Gain half proficiency in any Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution check you aren't proficient in.
features.level10: Additional Fighting Style: Learn another Fighting Style.
features.level15: Superior Critical: Critical hits now score on rolls of 18–20.
features.level18: Survivor: Regain HP equal to half your Fighter level at the start of each turn if below half HP.

name: Eldritch Knight
description: Eldritch Knights weave magic into their combat, combining spellcasting with martial prowess.

level3: Spellcasting: Learn two Wizard cantrips and three 1st-level spells.
Weapon Bond: Bond with up to two weapons, summoning them instantly.
features.level7: War Magic: Use a weapon attack and a cantrip in the same turn.
features.level10: Eldritch Strike: Attacks impose Disadvantage on enemy saves against your next spell.
features.level15: Arcane Charge: Teleport 30 feet as part of Action Surge.
features.level18: Improved War Magic: Cast a 1st or 2nd level spell and make two attacks in the same turn.

name: Psi Warrior
description: Psi Warriors channel psionic power to protect allies and unleash mental force in combat.

level3: Psionic Power: Gain Psi Energy Dice to fuel your psionic abilities.
Protective Field: Reduce damage taken by yourself or an ally.
Psionic Strike: Deal extra Force damage when you hit with a weapon.
Telekinetic Movement: Move an object or willing creature with your mind.
level7: Psi-Powered Leap: Gain Fly Speed for a turn.
Telekinetic Thrust: Move or knock prone an enemy you hit with Psionic Strike.
features.level10: Guarded Mind: Gain Resistance to Psychic damage and end Charmed or Frightened effects.
features.level15: Bulwark of Force: Create a protective barrier for allies.
features.level18: Telekinetic Master: Use Telekinesis once per rest without expending a spell slot.

name: Warrior of Mercy
description: Warriors of Mercy manipulate the life force of others. They are wandering physicians and bringers of both life and death.

level3: Hand of Harm: Deal extra necrotic damage with Unarmed Strike.
Hand of Healing: Heal an ally with a touch, also as part of Flurry of Blows.
Implements of Mercy: Gain proficiency with Insight, Medicine, and Herbalism Kit.
features.level6: Physician’s Touch: Enhance Hand of Harm and Healing with the ability to cure conditions or inflict Poisoned.
features.level11: Flurry of Healing and Harm: Replace each Unarmed Strike in Flurry of Blows with healing.

name: Warrior of Shadow
description: Monks of the Shadow embrace darkness and stealth, using shadow magic to strike unseen.

level3: Shadow Arts: Cast darkness, darkvision, pass without trace, or silence using Focus Points.
Shadow Step: Teleport up to 60 feet from shadow to shadow.
features.level6: Shadow Cloak: Become invisible when in dim light or darkness until you attack or cast a spell.
features.level11: Opportunist: Make a melee attack against a creature damaged by another’s attack within 5 feet of you.

name: Warrior of the Elements
description: These Monks channel elemental forces, shaping their Ki to wield flame, wave, or storm.

level3: Elemental Attunement: Manipulate elemental effects.
Elemental Strikes: Spend Focus Points to add elemental damage to your unarmed strikes.
features.level6: Elemental Evasion: Use Focus Points to negate damage from elemental effects.
features.level11: Elemental Flurry: Spend Focus Points to strike with elemental attacks in Flurry of Blows.

name: Warrior of the Open Hand
description: Masters of martial arts, these Monks learn to harness the power of perfect strikes and inner focus.

level3: Open Hand Technique: Add effects like knock prone, push, or block reactions to Flurry of Blows.
Wholeness of Body: Heal yourself with an action.
features.level6: Tranquility: Gain a sanctuary effect that lasts until you attack or cast a spell.
features.level11: Mastery of Body: Regain expended Focus Points when reducing an enemy to 0 HP.

name: Oath of Devotion
description: Paladins who swear the Oath of Devotion are devoted to justice and order, holding themselves and others to the highest standards of conduct.
tenets: Let your word be your promise.
Protect the weak and never fear to act.
Let your honorable deeds be an example.

level3: Sacred Weapon: Channel Divinity to imbue a melee weapon with positive energy, dealing Radiant damage.
Oath of Devotion Spells: Gain always-prepared spells.
features.level7: Aura of Devotion: You and allies in your aura are immune to being charmed.
features.level15: Smite of Protection: Allies gain Half Cover when you use Divine Smite.
features.level20: Holy Nimbus: As a bonus action, gain an aura of radiant damage and advantage on saving throws forced by Fiends and Undead for 10 minutes.

name: Oath of Glory
description: Paladins of this oath believe in heroic deeds and encourage companions to strive for greatness.
tenets: Endeavor to be known by your deeds.
Inspire others to strive for glory.

level3: Inspiring Smite: After using Divine Smite, grant Temporary Hit Points to nearby allies.
Peerless Athlete: Use Channel Divinity to gain advantage on Athletics and Acrobatics checks and increased jump distance.
features.level7: Aura of Alacrity: Increase Speed for you and allies in your aura.
features.level15: Glorious Defense: As a reaction, boost an ally's AC or make an attack if an attack misses.
features.level20: Living Legend: Gain advantage on Charisma checks, reroll failed saving throws, and ensure attacks hit for 10 minutes.

name: Oath of the Ancients
description: Paladins of this oath cherish life, light, and beauty, defending them against the darkness.

level3: Nature’s Wrath: Use Channel Divinity to restrain enemies with spectral vines.
Oath of the Ancients Spells: Gain always-prepared spells.
features.level7: Aura of Warding: You and allies in your aura have resistance to necrotic, psychic, and radiant damage.
features.level15: Undying Sentinel: Drop to 1 HP instead of 0 once per long rest; immunity to magical aging.
features.level20: Elder Champion: Aura grants disadvantage on saves for enemies, HP regeneration, and quicker spellcasting for 1 minute.

name: Oath of Vengeance
description: These Paladins swear to punish those who do great evil, pursuing them relentlessly.

level3: Vow of Enmity: Gain advantage on attacks against a creature you choose as your foe.
Oath of Vengeance Spells: Gain always-prepared spells.
features.level7: Relentless Avenger: When you hit with an Opportunity Attack, reduce the enemy’s Speed to 0 and move half your Speed.
features.level15: Soul of Vengeance: Make an immediate melee attack against a creature under Vow of Enmity if it hits or misses you.
features.level20: Avenging Angel: Gain flight and a frightening aura that affects enemies in your Aura of Protection.

name: Beast Master
description: A mystical bond with a primal beast, drawing strength from nature.

features.level3: Primal Companion: Summon a primal beast and bond with it.
features.level7: Exceptional Training: Command your beast to perform additional actions.
features.level11: Bestial Fury: Command your beast to make an extra attack.
features.level15: Share Spells: Your spells can also affect your companion.

name: Fey Wanderer
description: Rangers who have been touched by the feywilds, weaving fey magic and nature together.

features.level3: Dreadful Strikes: Add extra psychic damage to attacks.
features.level7: Otherworldly Glamour: Gain additional charm and persuasion abilities.
features.level11: Beguiling Twist: Redirect charms and fears onto other targets.
features.level15: Misty Presence: Step through the mists of the Feywild to slip past enemies.

name: Gloom Stalker
description: Masters of the shadows, striking from the darkness.

features.level3: Gloom Stalker Magic: Always have certain spells prepared.
features.level3_2: Umbral Sight: Gain Darkvision and become invisible to creatures relying on Darkvision.
features.level7: Iron Mind: Gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws.
features.level11: Stalker’s Flurry: Additional attacks and fear effects on targets.
features.level15: Shadowy Dodge: Disadvantage on attacks and teleport as a reaction.

name: Hunter
description: Guardians of the wilds, expert trackers and resilient warriors.

features.level3: Hunter’s Prey: Choose between different damage-focused features.
features.level7: Defensive Tactics: Gain additional defensive abilities.
features.level11: Multiattack: Gain options to attack multiple enemies.
features.level15: Superior Hunter’s Defense: Gain resistance or other defensive abilities.

name: Arcane Trickster
description: Enhance stealth and agility with spells, using magical tricks to aid in roguish work.

level3: Spellcasting: Learn Wizard cantrips and spells. Starts with 3 cantrips (Mage Hand + 2 Wizard).
Spell Slots and Prepared Spells: Increase with level, based on the Arcane Trickster Spellcasting table.
features.level7: Mage Hand Legerdemain: Improved control of Mage Hand, making it invisible and more precise.
features.level13: Magical Ambush: Creatures have disadvantage on saves against your spells when hidden.
features.level17: Versatile Trickster: Use Mage Hand to distract and grant Advantage on your attacks.

name: Assassin
description: Stealthy killers and infiltrators, masters of poisons and disguise.

level3: Assassinate: Advantage on Initiative and surprise attacks; extra damage on first hit in the first round.
Assassin’s Tools: Proficiency with Disguise Kit and Poisoner’s Kit.
features.level9: Infiltration Expertise: Mimic speech or handwriting perfectly after 1 hour of study.
features.level13: Envenom Weapons: Enhance poison damage when using the Poison option of Cunning Strike.
features.level17: Death Strike: Double damage on successful Sneak Attack in the first round if the target fails a save.

name: Soulknife
description: Harness psychic energy to create psionic blades and enhance mental abilities.

level3: Psionic Power: Use Psionic Energy Dice to fuel powers.
Psi-Bolstered Knack: Add dice to ability checks with proficiency.
Psychic Whispers: Establish telepathic communication with allies.
features.level9: Psychic Teleportation: Use dice to teleport as a Bonus Action.
features.level13: Psionic Veil: Become invisible for 1 minute.
features.level17: Rend Mind: Force a target to make a Wisdom save or be stunned.

name: Thief
description: Nimble and resourceful, masters of quick movement and creative use of items.

features.level3: Fast Hands: Use the Bonus Action granted by Cunning Action to make a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check, use thieves’ tools, or use an object.
features.level9: Supreme Sneak: Advantage on Stealth checks if moving no more than half speed.
features.level13: Use Magic Device: Use any magic item regardless of class, race, or level.
features.level17: Thief’s Reflexes: Take two turns in the first round of combat.

name: Aberrant Sorcery
description: Wield alien psionic power gifted by an otherworldly influence. These Sorcerers have been touched by the Far Realm or other dimensions, granting them unique psionic abilities.

level3: Psionic Spells: Always have certain spells prepared (Arms of Hadar, Calm Emotions, Detect Thoughts, Dissonant Whispers, Mind Sliver).
Telepathic Speech: Establish a telepathic link with a creature within 30 feet for a number of minutes equal to your Sorcerer level.
level6: Psionic Sorcery: Cast psionic spells by spending Sorcery Points instead of slots, bypassing components.
Psychic Defenses: Resistance to Psychic damage and advantage on saves to resist Charmed or Frightened conditions.
features.level14: Revelation in Flesh: Use Sorcery Points to magically alter your body for 10 minutes, gaining various benefits (e.g., fly speed, gills, spectral arms).

name: Clockwork Sorcery
description: Channel the cosmic order of the universe, using mechanical precision and the power of the cosmic gears.

features.level3: Clockwork Magic: Always have certain spells prepared (Alarm, Protection from Evil and Good, etc.) and gain proficiency with Smith's Tools.
features.level6: Bastion of Law: Use Sorcery Points to create a protective ward that absorbs damage.
features.level14: Trance of Order: Enter a state of perfect order that negates advantage or disadvantage on rolls near you.

name: Draconic Sorcery
description: Channel the ancient power of dragons in your blood, gaining resilience, draconic presence, and elemental magic.

features.level3: Draconic Resilience: Your skin toughens, giving you natural armor and increased HP.
features.level6: Elemental Affinity: Deal extra damage with spells matching your dragon type and gain resistance to that damage type.
features.level14: Dragon Wings: Sprout dragon wings to fly for 10 minutes.

name: Wild Magic Sorcery
description: Your magic is tied to chaos, and unpredictable surges of power manifest in the Wild Magic Surge table.

features.level3: Wild Magic Surge: Trigger a surge of random magical effects when you cast spells.
features.level6: Bend Luck: Spend Sorcery Points to add or subtract d4 to attack, save, or ability checks of any creature within 60 feet.
features.level14: Controlled Chaos: Reroll on the Wild Magic Surge table when rolling for a surge.

name: Archfey Patron
description: Your pact draws on the power of the Fey wild. The archfey are often inscrutable and whimsical, granting you the ability to weave illusions and charm others.

level3: Archfey Spells: Always have certain spells prepared, including Calm Emotions, Faerie Fire, Misty Step, Phantasmal Force, Sleep.
Steps of the Fey: Use Misty Step a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier, and gain additional effects like Temporary HP or imposing Disadvantage on enemies.
features.level6: Misty Escape: Use Misty Step as a reaction to taking damage, plus additional options like invisibility and psychic damage.
features.level10: Beguiling Defenses: Immune to the Charmed condition and reactive defense that reflects damage.

name: Celestial Patron
description: You serve a being of radiant light, gaining healing abilities and protective powers.

features.level3: Celestial Spells: Always have certain spells prepared, including Cure Wounds and Lesser Restoration.
features.level6: Healing Light: Use a pool of d6 dice to heal allies as a Bonus Action.
features.level10: Radiant Soul: Add radiant damage to spells and gain resistance to radiant damage.

name: Fiend Patron
description: Your patron is a powerful fiend from the Lower Planes, giving you powers of fire and destruction.

features.level3: Fiend Spells: Always have certain spells prepared, including Burning Hands, Fireball, and Scorching Ray.
features.level6: Dark One's Own Luck: Add a d10 to an ability check or saving throw once per rest.
features.level10: Fiendish Resilience: Gain resistance to one damage type of your choice each rest.

name: Great Old One Patron
description: You have made a pact with an entity from beyond the stars, gaining mind-bending powers and psychic abilities.

features.level3: Great Old One Spells: Always have certain spells prepared, including Detect Thoughts and Dissonant Whispers.
features.level3_2: Awakened Mind: Telepathic communication within a number of miles equal to your Charisma modifier.
features.level6: Clairvoyant Combatant: Gain advantage on attack rolls against a creature you have a telepathic link with.
features.level10: Thought Shield: Resistance to Psychic damage and reactive damage reflection.

name: Abjurer
description: Abjurers specialize in protective and banishing magic, shielding themselves and allies from harm and dismissing threats.

level3: Abjuration Savant: Add two level 1–2 Abjuration spells to your spellbook for free.
Arcane Ward: Create a protective ward when you cast Abjuration spells, absorbing damage until depleted.
features.level6: Projected Ward: Use your Reaction to let your Arcane Ward absorb damage for an ally within 30 feet.
features.level10: Improved Abjuration: Add proficiency bonus to ability checks made as part of casting Abjuration spells.

name: Diviner
description: Diviners glimpse the future and unravel secrets, using magic to manipulate fate and foresee the truth.

level3: Divination Savant: Add two level 1–2 Divination spells to your spellbook for free.
Portent: Roll two d20s and record the results, replacing rolls for yourself or others.
features.level6: Expert Divination: Regain spell slots after casting Divination spells of level 2+.
features.level10: Third Eye: Gain benefits like Darkvision or see invisibility.

name: Evoker
description: Evokers are masters of elemental magic, focusing their power for maximum damage.

level3: Evocation Savant: Add two level 1–2 Evocation spells to your spellbook for free.
Sculpt Spells: Create safe pockets for allies when casting Evocation spells.
features.level6: Potent Cantrip: Add damage even on failed saves with your cantrips.
features.level10: Empowered Evocation: Add Intelligence modifier to damage rolls of Evocation spells.

name: Illusionist
description: Illusionists weave deceptive illusions and falsehoods to confound their enemies and reshape reality.

level3: Illusion Savant: Add two level 1–2 Illusion spells to your spellbook for free.
Improved Minor Illusion: Use Minor Illusion cantrip to create both sound and image.
features.level6: Malleable Illusions: Alter illusions after casting to fit new situations.
features.level10: Illusory Self: Create a duplicate of yourself to deflect an attack.
